intro: The v-switch component provides users the ability to choose between two distinct values. These are very similar to a toggle, or on/off switch, though aesthetically different than a checkbox.

colors.heading: Colors
colors.intro: Switches can be colored by using any of the builtin colors and contextual names using the color prop.

flat.heading: Flat
flat.intro: You can make switch render without elevation of thumb using flat property.

inset.heading: Inset
inset.intro: You can make switch render in inset mode.

boolean.heading: Model as boolean
boolean.intro: A single v-switch will have a boolean value as its value.

states.heading: States
states.intro: v-switch can have different states such as default, disabled, and loading.

label.heading: Label
label.intro: Switch labels can be defined in label slot - that will allow to use HTML content.
